Producer: Tom Hern, Felipe Marino, Joe Neurauter
Production Co: Occupant Entertainment, Altitude Film Entertainment, Maze Pictures, Ingenious Media
Rating: R (Drug Use|Brief Graphic Nudity|Pervasive Language|Sexual References|Strong Bloody Violence)
Synopsis: Miles is a video game developer who inadvertently becomes the next participant in a real-life death match that streams online. While Miles soon excels at running away from everything, that won't help him outlast Nix, a killer at the top of her game.
Title: Guns Akimbo
